frame.name: PatternForge
frame.subtitle: Master chart patterns with AI-powered training
frame.description: A gamified trading education platform that helps novice and intermediate traders learn chart pattern recognition through interactive simulations and get real-time pattern alerts, all within their social trading community.
frame.tagline: Master chart patterns with AI-powered training and real-time alerts
frame.ogDescription: Learn chart pattern recognition through gamified drills and get real-time alerts on your watchlist.
